question:
[Gordon] took his son [Larry] out for pizza. [Gordon] and his uncle [Joseph] went to the movies Sunday after church and got popcorn and candy while they were there. [Michele] and her brother [Joseph] enlisted in the army [Dannielle] went over to her uncle [Larry]'s house for dinner. [William] and his brother [Joseph] played harmonicas together. [William]'s daughter [Dannielle] loved it. [Joseph] took his nephew [Martin] out to get some ice cream to celebrate his baseball victory. [Dana] and her daughter, [Ethel], were making dinner. [Ethel]'s son, [Martin], helped with the salad.
Question: How is [Michele] related to [Dana]?
